document.title: Kate's Braces Treatment Plan
document.summary: Hey Kate! We're going to use traditional braces to focus on your upper teeth for about 7–10 months. Since it's a moderate case, we'll be checking your progress both remotely and with some in-clinic visits. There might be some attachments used along the way to help guide the process.
next_steps: Attend the initial fitting appointment for your braces
Follow up on scheduled remote and in-clinic monitoring appointments
Reach out if you have any questions or concerns during treatment
